articles.author: Taylor Baird
articles.title: Matthews scores twice for Maple Leafs in OT victory against Stars - NHL.com
articles.description: Auston Matthews scored his second goal of the game at 2:10 of overtime to give the Toronto Maple Leafs a 4-3 win against the Dallas Stars at American Airlines Center on Thursday.
articles.content: DALLAS --Auston Matthews scored his second goal of the game at 2:10 of overtime to give the Toronto Maple Leafs a 4-3 win against the Dallas Stars at American Airlines Center on Thursday.It was Matth… [+4013 chars]
